description: Bootstrap a node with puppet-agent for Linux

master.description: The fqdn of the master from which the puppet-agent should be bootstrapped

cacert_content.description: The expected CA certificate content for the master

certname.description: The certname with which the node should be bootstrapped

environment.description: The environment in which the node should be bootstrapped

set_noop.description: The noop setting in the [agent] section of puppet.conf

dns_alt_names.description: The DNS alt names with which the agent certificate should be generated

custom_attribute.description: This setting is added to puppet.conf and included in the custom_attributes section of csr_attributes.yaml

extension_request.description: This setting is added to puppet.conf and included in the extension_requests section of csr_attributes.yaml

puppet_conf_settings.description: Puppet conf settings. See https://www.puppet.com/docs/pe/2021.7/installing_nix_and_windows_agents_using_an_install_script.html#customize-install-script for usage instructions
